The problem with having such widespread IPTV usage (only $5/month) is that the DVD/Bluray market is virtually dead in korea. Consequently the korean film studios have to make all their money from cinema ticket sales resulting in less of great films from the likes of park chan-wook and kim ki-duk which tend to not do well in cinemas and more of garbage films with shitty 3D post production and dumbed-down comedies.
